Repository containing the data and scripts used to map reef research in the article of Osmar Luiz (Charles Darwin University, Australia).

Description of the files in this folder:

**Root**  
|  
|- **data**: raw datasets  
  | -------  *capitals.csv*: coordinates of capitals. Collected by ALLuza  
  | -------  *HistoricalData_60s_90s*: old papers missing DOIs  
  | -------  *BaseLines_2*: Brazilian Exclusive Economic Zone    
  | -------  *Basic_Data*: Basic Data from topic modeling (topic modeling output; another ReadMe file can be found inside this folder)    
  | -------  *magris_reef_map*: Shapefiles of Brazilian reef distribution (From Magris et al. 2020, Diversity and Distributions)     
  | -------  *MPAs*: Shapefiles of Brazilian Marine Protected Areas (From CNUC 2021)    
  | -------  *South_America*: Shapefile of south America    
|    
|- **docs**: presentation and meet record    
|    
|- **output**: raw plots    
|    
|- **1-Rscript_HTML**: folder containing R codes for processing reviewed data:    
  |    
  | -------  *packages.R*: required packages    
  | -------  *retLongLatFunction.R*: regular expression to extract text from html files (by Dr. Cristian Dambros, UFSM)    
  | -------  *extract_text_organize_data.R*: extract and organize data (call the other two '.R' files)    
    
|- **1-processed_data_HTML**: processed data after running the codes in **1-Rscript_HTML**    
  |    
  | ------- *saved_text.RData*: extracted text (saved because it needs to be extracted in the university web)    
  | ------- *spatial_data_topic_modeling.RData*: data organized for mapping (extracted coordinates)    
  | ------- *spatial_data_topic_modeling.csv*: data organized for mapping (extracted coordinates -- file modified by O. Luiz to include coordinates not extracted using the function "retLongLatFunction.R")    
  | ------- *na_dois.csv*: papers with missing DOI    
  | ------- *get_missing_dois.csv*: get missing dois, same as in the data    
  | ------- *resu_dxdoi.RData*: coordinates extracted (originally not in decimal degrees)    
  | ------- *findtLongLat_dxdoi.RData*: coordinates extracted (originally in decimal degrees)    
    
|- **2-Rscript_mapping**: folder containing R codes for mapping and producing the map in the main text:    
  |    
  | -------  *packages.R*: required packages    
  | -------  *mapping_of_papers.R*: codes used to create the spatial grid and map research    
    
|- **2-processed_data_manual_coord_extraction**: folder containing processed data after the addition of coordinates not captured by the function "retLongLatFunction.R":    
  |    
  | ------- *spatial_data_topic_modeling_3.csv*: dataset updated by Osmar Luiz in 2023 (updated version of the file 'spatial_data_topic_modeling'  generated by the function of HTML coordinate extraction)    
  | ------- *M2.csv*: topic modeling output    
  | ------- *topic_names.csv*: topic names    
  | ------- *topic_names.xlsx*: topic names
